headline: Evercore ISI Raises PT on Wells Fargo & Company (WFC), Keeps an Outperform Rating
summary: Wells Fargo & Company (NYSE:WFC) is one of the Best and Cheap Stocks to Buy Right Now. On September 30, John Pancari from Evercore ISI raised the firm’s price target on Wells Fargo & Company (NYSE:WFC) from $94 to $98, while keeping an Outperform rating on the stock. The analyst noted that the regional banks […]
